alert.note: Alert for Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 06 at 3:19AM CDT until April 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH 9 PM THURSDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF THE OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND ALL BUT THE FAR SOUTHWEST TEXAS PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * Affected Area...In Texas...Oldham. * 20 Foot Winds...Northwest winds 25 to 39 mph with higher gusts Thursday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 to 10 percent Thursday. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 7 Thursday. * Timing...10 AM CDT Thursday through 9 PM CDT Thursday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
